00080 bool InfoDialog::Create( wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& caption, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style )
00081 {
00083     m_left_panel = NULL;
00084     m_left_sizer = NULL;
00085     m_caenvmetool_rev = NULL;
00087 
00089     SetExtraStyle(GetExtraStyle()|wxWS_EX_BLOCK_EVENTS);
00090     wxDialog::Create( parent, id, caption, pos, size, style );
00091 
00092     CreateControls();
00093     SetIcon(GetIconResource(wxT("scope2.png")));
00094     if (GetSizer())
00095     {
00096         GetSizer()->SetSizeHints(this);
00097     }
00098     Centre();
00100     return true;
00101 }

00193 wxBitmap InfoDialog::GetBitmapResource( const wxString& name )
00194 {
00195     // Bitmap retrieval
00197     wxUnusedVar(name);
00198     if (name == _T("caen.png"))
00199     {
00200         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("caen.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00201         return bitmap;
00202     }
00203     return wxNullBitmap;
00205 }
